about_the_game:
Give your male Japanese characters a voice to be heard with Japanese Anime Voices：Male Character Series Vol.7 from TK Projects!

Following the very popular Japanese Anime Voice series this pack will expand your project with more exciting and fun Japanese male anime-voices speaking very usable Japanese phrases!

Bring your anime characters to life with these common, everyday vocal phrases for Attacks, Weep, Thinking, Deny, Watch out and many, many more!

FEATURES:

* 126 Japanese animation-like male voices (phrases)
* OGG, M4A formats included
* Male voices (in Japanese phrases) for Visual Novel Games, RPG and much more!
* English translation list included
* For use in RPG Maker VX Ace or the engines of your choice!

Tracklist:

1. 001_Start1.wav いくぜぇ! I'm going in!
2. 002_Start2.wav やってやるぜぇ I'm gonna take you down!
3. 003_Victory1.wav うっし、これで終わりだな Alright, that finishes that
4. 004_Victory2.wav よっしゃあ! Alright!
5. 005_Follow1.wav おう! Right!
6. 006_Follow2.wav わかったぜ Got it
7. 007_Choice1.wav どうすんだ? What are we doing?
8. 008_Choice2.wav 指示をくれ Tell me what to do
9. 009_Runaway1.wav さっさと逃げるぜ Let's get outta here
10. 010_Runaway2.wav あばよ See y
11. 011_Tool use1.wav これを使うぜ I'm gonna use this
12. 012_Tool use2.wav そらよ Check this out

19. 019_Unable to fight1.wav ぐっ...ちくしょう... Gh, damn it...
20. 020_Unable to fight2.wav あとは...たのんだぜ... The rest... is up to you...

23. 023_Damage3.wav いたっ Ouch

32. 032_No damage2.wav へっそんなもんか! Heh, that the best you got!?

35. 035_Weak attack3.wav うらっ Urah-

39. 039_Medium attack2.wav せいやっ Hyaa-
40. 040_Medium attack3.wav うっしゃ Shaa-
41. 041_Medium attack4.wav そらっ Watch this
42. 042_Medium attack5.wav くらえっ Take this

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *:Microsoft® Windows® XP / Vista / 7 (32-bit/64-bit)
  • Processor:Intel® Pentium® 4 2.0 GHz equivalent or faster processor
  • Memory:512 MB RAM
  • Graphics:1024 x 768 pixels or higher desktop resolution
  • Hard Drive:400 MB HD space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Processor:Intel® Pentium® 4 2.0 GHz equivalent or faster processor
  • Memory:512 MB RAM

short_description: Give your male Japanese characters a voice to be heard with Japanese Anime Voices：Male Character Series Vol.7 from TK Projects!
